Willd.--Willdenow, Carl Ludwig.     TREES OF NEW ENGLAND.     PINOIDEÆ. PINE FAMILY. CONIFERS.   ABIETACEÆ. CUPRESSACEÆ.  Trees or shrubs, resinous; leaves simple, mostly evergreen, relatively small, entire, needle-shaped, awl-shaped, linear, or scale-like; stipules none;
